name: Meteor Shower (Trijam #121)
description:
Use WASD to move. You can jump infinitely and use S to lower yourself. Push enter to restart.
Avoid the meteors. How long can you last?

Full screen is recommended for this game.

This game uses Unreal Engine's 2D Side Scroller blueprint. Unreal Engine can be found here.

This game was developed in about 4 and a half hours as part of Trijam 121.
